name: @have/pdf
description: Modern PDF processing utilities with text extraction and OCR support using unpdf and @gutenye/ocr-node

scripts.docs: typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out docs --entryPoints ./src/index.ts --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json --excludePrivate --excludeInternal --hideGenerator --fileExtension .md --readme none --categorizeByGroup false --includeVersion false --hidePageHeader --hidePageTitle false --outputFileStrategy modules
scripts.docs:watch: typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --out docs --entryPoints ./src/index.ts --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json --excludePrivate --excludeInternal --hideGenerator --fileExtension .md --readme none --categorizeByGroup false --includeVersion false --hidePageHeader --hidePageTitle false --outputFileStrategy modules --watch
scripts.dev: bun run build:watch & bun run test:watch
